animeTitle: Mob Psycho 100: Reigen - Shirarezaru Kiseki no Reinouryokusha (Dub)
otherNames: Mob Psycho 100: Reigen - The Miracle Psychic that Nobody Knows, モブサイコ100 REIGEN ～知られざる奇跡の霊能力者～ ; Mob Psycho 100 Reigen: The Miraculous Unknown Psychic
synopsis: A summary episode of Mob Psycho 100 which features commentary from Reigen Arataka.
